attributes.action: Add tax year 2019-2020 to the self employed grand scheme
attributes.additional_details: We estimate there are hundreds of thousands of these new entrepreneurs who face their business being crushed just as it has got started.
attributes.background: The government should consider adding tax year ending 2019-2020 to the grand scheme for those self-employed sole traders who set up on the middle of 2018 and not earned  enough to be calculated as full 12 months and those who started after 6 April 2019.
